text: Andrée Bermond (29 March 1929 - 19 September 2010) was a French alpine skier. She competed in three events at the 1952 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2010 deaths Category:French female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of France Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Andrée Bermond
